sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import styles from "../scss/home.module.scss" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const Home = props => { const [openAbout, setOpenAbout] = useState(false) const openAboutMe = e => { e.preventDefault() //prevent transition //console.log(e.screenX, e.screenY) // let x = e.screenX + "px" // let y = e.screenY + "px" // setCoordinateX(x) // setCoordinateY(y) openAbout(true) // and after timeout window.setTimeout(() => { props.history.push("/AboutMe") // history is available by design in this.props when using react-router }, 500) // 3 } const openWork = e => { e.preventDefault() //prevent transition console.log(e.screenX, e.screenY) let x = e.screenX + "px" let y = e.screenY + "px" setCoordinateX(x) setCoordinateY(y) setOpen(true) // and after timeout window.setTimeout(() => { props.history.push("/AboutMe") // history is available by design in this.props when using react-router }, 500) // 3 } return (
